item.title: Kansas City Chiefs CEO Clark Hunt Talks ’The Kingdom’ and “Spectacle” of Taylor Swift’s Fandom
item.description: Hunt opens up on how the series aligns with the Chiefs’ entertainment prospects: “We have an opportunity with Foolish Club Studios to really expand on that to do both scripted and unscripted type vent
